resources.string: Enable call recording and disable data notification. Tap here to configure settings.
Disable data charge warning when you enable mobile data.
Disable data notify when you disable mobile data.(For Z1)
Disable data notify when you disable mobile data.(For A)
Hide statusbar icon and notification which appears when you disable mobile data.
Enable call recording future.\nRecording button is in the menu of calling screen.
Show preference to use 3G only in mobile data settings.
Show all network mode in mobile data settings.
*Check this if you are using DoCoMo ROM*\nShow all network mode in mobile data settings.
You may need to reboot for changes to take effect.
